biotools.summary: Data management and workflow tool for the parallel determination of protein-ligand structures. It was initially written to support crystallographic fragment screening at beamline I04-1 at the Diamond Light Source, but it is a generic program that can be used to facilitate any structure-based drug design project.

bioschemas.name: XChemExplorer
